markdown:
The average azarketi citizen in Absalom makes a living fishing or catching crabs. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 14 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9 [Azarketi Crab Catcher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2838) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 31 1.1 **Perception** +6 **Languages** [Alghollthu](/Languages.aspx?ID=24), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +3, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5, [Underwater Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4 **Str** +2 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +1 **Items** [crab cage](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1698), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Sack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=45) --- **AC** 16 **Fort** +6 **Ref** +9 **Will** +3 **HP** 15 **Hydration** Azarketi must regularly submerge themselves in water to rehydrate their water-acclimated skin. After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a –1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they begin to [suffocate](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) until returned to water.
**Swim Away** **Requirement** The azarketi crab catcher is swimming; **Trigger** The azarketi crab catcher is targeted with an attack and can see the attacker; **Effect** The azarketi crab catcher gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack, they Swim 5 feet. --- **Speed** 25 feet; swim 25 feet **Melee** dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+2 piercing **Ranged** dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+2 piercing
name: Azarketi Crab Catcher

After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a –1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they begin to suffocate until returned to water.
